word:
THE SCRIPTURES HONORED
 
     THE WRITINGS OF MRS. WHITE POINT CONSTANTLY TO THE BIBLE AS THE GREAT SOURCE OF ALL SPIRITUAL TRUTH. THEY
249
ABOUND IN SCRIPTURAL QUOTATIONS, TO WHICH SHE GIVES NO FANCIFUL INTERPRETATION. HER WRITINGS ARE NOT REGARDED BY SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTISTS AS AN ADDITION TO THE BIBLE, NOR IS THEIR STUDY TO TAKE THE PLACE OF BIBLE STUDY. SHE HERSELF HAS WRITTEN:
